mapper.select: select count(1) from platform_saleafter where order_code = #{code} and status != 3

select a.service_number returnGoodsNumber,a.status returnGoodsStatus,b.grand_total returnGoodsMoney, a.order_code orderCode,a.user_code userCode,c.receiver_name userName,c.receiver_phone_number userPhone, b.remark remake,CONCAT(c.province_name,c.city_name,c.area_name) contactAddress,c.detail_address address
from platform_saleafter a left join client_order b on a.order_code = b.order_code left join client_shipping_address c on a.user_code = c.user_code where a.service_number = #{serviceName}

select a.service_number returnGoodsNumber,a.status returnGoodsStatus,b.grand_total returnGoodsMoney, a.order_code orderCode,a.user_code userCode,c.receiver_name userName,c.receiver_phone_number userPhone, b.remark remake,CONCAT(c.province_name,c.city_name,c.area_name) contactAddress,c.detail_address address ,DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') time,d.three_party_number threePartyNumber, d.order_time orderTime from platform_saleafter a left join client_order b on a.order_code = b.order_code left join client_shipping_address c on a.user_code = c.user_code left join client_pay d on a.order_code = d.order_number where a.service_number = #{serviceName}

SELECT coi.product_code AS productCode, coi.product_name AS productName, ig.goods_no AS productModuleNo, coi.product_price AS productPrice, coi.quantity AS quantity, coi.specification_info AS specificationInfo, coi.total_discount_product_price AS totalDiscountProductPrice, coi.product_tip as productTip, coi.product_discount as productDiscount FROM client_order_item coi join iwebshop_goods ig on coi.product_code = ig.id WHERE coi.order_code = #{orderCode}
select province_name pname,city_name cname, area_name aname from client_shipping_address where user_code = #{code}
